name: POLYGUN_TRIAL
description:
It is a demo game and this is still under development. And soon I will be launching a battle royale version of this game in the next update.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:-

MINIMUM:- intel i3 or amdfx4300 and better , 2gb ram , integrated graphics or external graphics card.

RECOMMENDED:- intel i5 or amdfx6300 , 4gb ram , gt710.

PLEASE IGNORE ANY BUGS AND GLITCHES AS THIS IS ONLY A DEMO VERSION LATER I WILL BE MAKING IT INTO A BATTLE ROYALE.

CONTROLS:-

W , A ,S,D -TO MOVE

R-RELOAD

Q-KNIFE

E-HOSTLER  WEAPON

T-INSPECT

HOLD W+SHIFT TO SPRINT

LEFT CLICK - SHOOT

RIGHT CLICK - AIM

G-GRENADE

SPACE-JUMP

USE 1,2,3,4 - TO TOGGLE BETWEEN FAST AND SLOW 

1 IS THE FASTEST AND 4 IS THE SLOWEST
